## 1.1

Problem 1.1 

```{r chapter 1 problem 1.1}
df <- data.frame(
  j = c(14, 15, 16, 22, 24, 25),
  n = c(1,1,3,2,2,5))
df <- df %>% mutate(
  jn = j * n,
  p  = n / sum(df$n))
df <- df %>% mutate(
  jp = j * p,
  j2 = j * j)
ej = sum(df$jp)
df <- df %>% mutate(
  dj  = j - ej,
  j2p = j2 * p)
ej2p = sum(df$j2p)
df <- df %>% mutate(
  dj2 = dj * dj)
df <- df %>% mutate(
  dj2p = dj2 * p)
sdm1 = sqrt(sum(df$dj2p))
sdm2 = sqrt(ej2p - ej * ej)
df
```
